import React from 'react'; import {logout} from '../actions/userActions'; import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; function ProfileScreen(props) { const [name, setName] = useState const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()); } const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(update({email, name, password})) } return
